text: In addition, Perspective Software GmbH processes further data, some of which may also be personal data, in order to provide its services, in particular for the operation of the Mobile Funnel.

Google Analytics uses "cookies", which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site.
The information generated by the cookie about your use of this website is usually transmitted to a Google server in the USA and stored there.
Matomo stores cookies on your end device that enable your use of our website to be analyzed.

Data logged when accessing the Linkando GmbH website will only be transmitted to third parties if we are legally obliged to do so or if disclosure is necessary for legal or criminal prosecution in the event of attacks on communications technology.
